price: Kì í ṣe ọ̀rọ̀ eléwì. Ohun tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ kéré púpọ̀.
arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā huwa biqawli shāʿirin qalīlan mā tu'minūna
